title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the Java editor, there is no popup menu appearing when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints and marks, but it is not showing up.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
EB: A popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints and marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected result is that a popup menu appears, providing options to add breakpoints and marks, but this is not happening with the Photon version of the editor.
